item.description: It's Football Season.Come join us Sunday @ 8pm for Karaoke at the Rosebud.This weeks it's the Patriots vs the Ravens and we will have the game on all the TVs during Karaoke Night. So no need to miss the game and enjoy yourself at karaoke. Great place to hangout, have a few drinks, and some great pub food and appetizers. Come on down and support the Patriots and watch them crush the Ravens. We got a great sound system, even better song selection and just a great atmosphere for Karaoke and fun. So wear your Pats gear and come on down. Kick off is at 8pm....GO PATS!!!!!!!!!!
item.name: Sunday Night Karaoke @ the Rosebud Bar & Grille
